Title: Ingle's Endodontic
Author: জন আই. ইঙ্গেল
Summary:
Ingle's Endodontics
The 41 chapters of this comprehensive textbook, written by 88 specialists worldwide, offer the latest methods and technology of an essential practice. New to the 6th ed. are expanded treatment of the diagnosis and management of pain and infections, and the addition of CT scans in the chapter on maximilliary sinusitis and endodontic disease. The chapters are well organized and practical in nature, with clear discussion of the science as well as the practice. Nine chapters are devoted to pathobiology. Other sections discuss the discipline and practice of endodontics, the basics of examination and treatment planning, management, surgical procedures, and related treatments. The chapters are heavily illustrated with clinical photos, radiographs, and photomicrographs of excellent quality, clearly marked and captioned to accompany the points in the text. A DVD is also included, containing plates of coronal cavity preparation and video presentations of seven techniques.
